definition: plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
to build by laying bricks or stones

sentences.english: Based on Teds paving method, algorithm for generating high quality meshes of quadrilateral elements from arbitrary 2-D geometry is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了任意二維區域的全四邊形網格生成的鋪砌法。

sentences.english: Cutting, shaping and laying tiles to floor, wall and roof.
sentences.chinese: 切割及鋪砌各種磚片及屋瓦。

sentences.english: We can distinguish between paved runway and unpaved areas.
sentences.chinese: 我們能分清鋪砌的跑道和未鋪砌的地方。

sentences.english: We can distinguish between paved runway and unpaved areas.
sentences.chinese: 我們能分清鋪砌的跑道和未鋪砌的地方。

sentences.english: Typically, this sport is known as biking on an unpaved surface.
sentences.chinese: 通常情況下，這項運動被稱爲騎自行車上鋪砌的表面。

sentences.english: Somehow it had veered off the paved crossing.
sentences.chinese: 不知怎的它脫離了軌道的鋪砌道口。
